蛅蛅蛅

蛅字的基本解释

蛅
zhān
〔蛅蟖（
s?）〕a.一种毛虫，背毛蜇人，如“蛅蛅处处树上有之，牡丹上尤多。入药惟取榴棘上房内有蛹者。”b.鳞翅目昆虫的幼虫。均亦作“蛅蛅”。

蛅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhān］
［《廣韻》汝鹽切，平鹽，日。］
(1)见“蛅蟴”。
(2)见“蛅蠆”。

蛅字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蛅； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1080第17
【唐韻】汝鹽切【集韻】如占切，?音髥。【爾雅·釋蟲】蟔，蛅蟖。【註】蛓屬也，今靑州人呼蛓爲蛅蟖。孫叔然云八角螫蟲，失之。【本草】雀瓮，一名蛅蟖房，一名?舍，一名紅姑娘。陶弘景曰：蛅蟖，蚝蟲也，在石榴樹上，其背毛螫人。　又【集韻】之廉切，音占。義同。

蛅字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蛅字的起名意思

暂无。

Clam
Basic explanation of words
Clam
zhān
〔蛅蟖(
s?)] a. A kind of caterpillar, which stings people on the back hair, such as "the cricket is found on the tree everywhere, especially on the peony. It is used as medicine only if there is a pupae in the upper chamber of the thorn spines." b. Lepidopteran insects larva. Both are also referred to as "crickets".
Clam
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhān］
["Guangyun" Ru salt cut, flat salt, day. ]
(1) See "蛅蟴".
(2) See "蛅虿".
Clam
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蛅; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1080 Page 17
[Tang Yun] Ru Yanqie 【Ji Yun】 such as Zhanqie, the sound is 髥. [Erya·Release insects] 蟔, 蛅蟖. [Note] The crickets are also genus, and today the people of Tarzhou call crickets as crickets. Sun Shuranyun lost the octagonal sting. [Materia Medica] A bird urn, a small house, a house, and a red girl. Tao Hongjing said: The worms and oyster worms are also stinging on the pomegranate tree.　[Jiyun] The Lianqie, Yinzhan. The same meaning.
